attributes.action: order a review into the role of British police in relation to the Portuguese inquiry into the disappearance of Madeleine McCann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Almost two years after Madeleine McCann vanished, there has been no trace of her and no-one has yet been brought to justice, even though it is certain that at least one very serious criminal offence has been committed.  We ask the Prime Minister to order a review into the role played by British police in this investigation, with a view to establishing the best way to bring this investigation to a successful conclusion.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "order a review into the role of British police in relation to the Portuguese inquiry into the disappearance of Madeleine McCann."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21013


Prime Minister's Office
